Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity

  • Packages that use SimEntity 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    The package provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets) and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core
    The package provides core classes used just internally by CloudSim Plus, except the CloudSim class that is the start point and main class used to run simulations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    The package provides Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches  

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

      Subinterfaces of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DatacenterBroker
      Represents a broker acting on behalf of a cloud customer.
      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterBrokerAbstract
      An abstract class to be used as base for implementing a DatacenterBroker.
      class  DatacenterBrokerHeuristic
      A simple implementation of DatacenterBroker that uses some heuristic to get a suboptimal mapping among submitted cloudlets and Vm's.
      class  DatacenterBrokerSimple
      A simple implementation of DatacenterBroker that try to host customer's VMs at the first switches found.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkDatacenterBroker
      NetDatacentreBroker is a DatacenterBroker implementation that works with network components such as NetworkDatacenter, NetworkHost and NetworkVm.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerDatacenterBroker
      A power-aware DatacenterBrokerSimple.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CloudCloudSimShutdown
      CloudimShutdown waits for termination of all CloudSim user entities to determine the end of simulation.
      class  CloudInformationService
      A Cloud Information Service (CIS) is an entity that provides cloud resource registration, indexing and discovery services.
      class  CloudSimEntity
      This class represents a simulation entity.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core declared as SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SimEntity SimEntity.NULL
      An attribute that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for SimEntity objects.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core that return SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimEntity Simulation.getEntity(int id)
      Get the entity with a given id.
      SimEntity CloudSim.getEntity(int id) 
      SimEntity Simulation.getEntity(String name)
      Get the entity with a given name.
      SimEntity CloudSim.getEntity(String name) 
      SimEntity SimEntity.setName(String newName)
      Sets the Entity name.
      SimEntity CloudSimEntity.setName(String newName) 
      SimEntity SimEntity.setSimulation(Simulation simulation)
      Sets the CloudSim instance that represents the simulation the Entity is related to.
      SimEntity CloudSimEntity.setSimulation(Simulation simulation) 
      SimEntity CloudSimEntity.setState(SimEntity.State state)
      Sets the entity state.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core that return types with arguments of type SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,SimEntity> Simulation.getEntitiesByName()
      Gets a read-only map where each key is the name of an SimEntity and each value is the actual SimEntity.
      Map<String,SimEntity> CloudSim.getEntitiesByName() 
      List<SimEntity> Simulation.getEntityList()
      Returns a read-only list of entities created for the simulation.
      List<SimEntity> CloudSim.getEntityList() 
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core with parameters of type SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void CloudSim.addEntityDynamically(SimEntity e)
      Internal method used to add a new entity to the simulation when the simulation is running.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters

      Subinterfaces of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Datacenter
      An interface to be implemented by each class that provides Datacenter features.
      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterSimple
      Implements the basic features of a Virtualized Cloud Datacenter.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkDatacenter
      NetworkDatacenter class is a Datacenter whose hostList are virtualized and networked.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerDatacenter
      PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
      class  PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
      PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware is a class that represents a non-power aware data center in the context of power-aware simulations.

    • Uses of SimEntity in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches that implement SimEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggregateSwitch
      This class represents an Aggregate Switch in a Datacenter network.
      class  EdgeSwitch
      This class represents an Edge Switch in a Datacenter network.
      class  RootSwitch
      This class allows to simulate Root switch which connects Datacenters to external network.
      class  Switch
      Represents a Network Switch.
